title: infidelity
overview: An adult remake of the 1967 classic 'The Graduate' tells the story of Joe Binghamton's secret affair with an older women Jean Morrison and dates her daughter Priscilla Morrison.He is set to marry Priscilla but she discovers Joe is two timing her and the Binghampton family & Morrison family end up in an argument, Joe is ashamed of letting his bride down. His luck runs out with the Morrison's except Priscilla Morrison's sister Veronica who is taken in by all the excitement.
